mapper.insert: insert into ftp_funding( user_org_no, category_no, title, content, tel, email, start_dt, end_dt, goal, status) values( #{orgNo}, #{category.no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{moneyTarget}, #{status})
mapper.select: select d.funding_no, d.title, d.content, d.tel, d.email, d.start_dt, d.end_dt, datediff(date_format(d.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(d.start_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')) total_dt, datediff(date_format(d.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')) remain_dt, d.goal, d.status, p.id leader_id, p.name leader_name, c.title title, f.filepath from ftp_funding d inner join ftp_user_org o on d.user_org_no=o.user_org_no inner join ftp_category c on d.category_no=c.category_no inner join ftp_user p on p.user_no=o.user_no left outer join ftp_funding_file f on d.funding_no=f.funding_no order by funding_no desc

select d.funding_no, d.title, d.content, d.tel, d.email, d.start_dt, d.end_dt, datediff(date_format(d.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(d.start_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')) total_dt, datediff(date_format(d.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')) remain_dt, d.goal, p.id leader_id, p.name leader_name, c.title title, f.filepath from ftp_funding d inner join ftp_user_org o on d.user_org_no=o.user_org_no inner join ftp_category c on d.category_no=c.category_no inner join ftp_user p on p.user_no=o.user_no left outer join ftp_funding_file f on d.funding_no=f.funding_no where d.status=1 order by d.funding_no desc

select d.funding_no, d.title, d.content, d.tel, d.email, d.start_dt, d.end_dt, datediff(date_format(d.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(d.start_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')) total_dt, datediff(date_format(d.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')) remain_dt, d.goal, p.id leader_id, p.name leader_name, c.title title, f.filepath from ftp_funding d inner join ftp_user_org o on d.user_org_no=o.user_org_no inner join ftp_category c on d.category_no=c.category_no inner join ftp_user p on p.user_no=o.user_no left outer join ftp_funding_file f on d.funding_no=f.funding_no where d.status=2 order by d.funding_no desc
select datediff(date_format(d.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(d.start_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')) total_dt from ftp_funding d where d.funding_no=#{donationNo}
select datediff(date_format(d.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(curdate(),'%Y-%m-%d')) remain_dt from ftp_funding d where d.funding_no=#{donationNo}

select d.funding_no, d.title, d.content, d.tel, d.email, d.start_dt, d.end_dt, datediff(date_format(d.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(d.start_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')) datediff, d.goal, p.id leader_id, p.name leader_name, c.title title, f.filepath from ftp_funding d inner join ftp_user_org o on d.user_org_no=o.user_org_no inner join ftp_category c on d.category_no=c.category_no inner join ftp_user p on p.user_no=o.user_no left outer join ftp_funding_file f on d.funding_no=f.funding_no where d.funding_no=#{donationNo}

select d.funding_no, d.title, d.content, d.tel, d.email, d.start_dt, d.end_dt, datediff(date_format(d.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(d.start_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')) datediff, d.goal, p.id leader_id, p.name leader_name, c.title title, f.filepath from ftp_funding d inner join ftp_user_org o on d.user_org_no=o.user_org_no inner join ftp_category c on d.category_no=c.category_no inner join ftp_user p on p.user_no=o.user_no left outer join ftp_funding_file f on d.funding_no=f.funding_no where d.funding_no=#{donationNo} and d.status=1

select d.funding_no, d.title, d.content, d.tel, d.email, d.start_dt, d.end_dt, datediff(date_format(d.end_dt,'%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(d.start_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')) datediff, d.goal, p.id leader_id, p.name leader_name, c.title title, f.filepath from ftp_funding d inner join ftp_user_org o on d.user_org_no=o.user_org_no inner join ftp_category c on d.category_no=c.category_no inner join ftp_user p on p.user_no=o.user_no left outer join ftp_funding_file f on d.funding_no=f.funding_no where d.title like(concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) or d.content like (concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) or p.name like (concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) order by d.funding_no desc
mapper.update: update ftp_funding set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, tel=#{tel}, email=#{email}, start_dt=#{startDate}, end_dt=#{endDate}, goal=#{moneyTarget} where funding_no=#{no}
